item.name: Get Skills Grouped by Similar Skills

request.description: Returns all location combinations with job counts for a given designation or skill. For example: 'Software Engineer' returns 'Software Engineer jobs in Bangalore (50)', 'Software Engineer jobs in Delhi (30)', etc.

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Returns similar designations and skills that have jobs, along with their job counts. For designations: First checks the similar_designations column in the designation index. If no similar designations found, groups designations by department and returns those with jobs. For skills: Searches the skills index to find related skills and returns their job counts.

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Takes a combination of (designation or skill) + location and returns job counts with location combinations and similar designations/skills. The type (designation or skill) is automatically detected based on the query. For example: 'Software Engineer + Delhi' returns job counts and similar designation+location combinations. 'Java + Delhi' returns job counts and similar skill+location combinations.

response.name: Success Response

query.description: Number of top designations to return

request.description: Returns the top designations ordered by job count. Useful for SEO to show most popular job titles.

query.description: Number of top skills to return

request.description: Returns the top skills ordered by job count. Useful for SEO to show most popular skills.

item.name: Generate and Save Topics for Designation
Generate and Save Questions for Skill

request.description: Returns the main sitemap index containing references to all sitemap files. Reads from database cache (generated by background process) and only includes sitemaps that exist in cache. If no sitemaps exist, returns empty sitemap with comment.
Returns company pages sitemap with URLs like https://www.tymblhub.com/{companyname}-careers-cid-{companyId}
Returns location-wise jobs sitemap with URLs like https://www.tymblhub.com/jobs-in-delhi
Returns designation-wise jobs sitemap with URLs like https://www.tymblhub.com/front-end-developer-jobs
Returns skill-wise jobs sitemap with URLs like https://www.tymblhub.com/java-jobs
Returns job description sitemap with URLs like https://www.tymblhub.com/{designation}-jobs-in-{location}-in-{companyName}-for-{experience}-jid-{jobId}
Manually triggers refresh of all sitemap cache data from Elasticsearch
Returns the status of sitemap cache including last generated times and counts
